languages.text: "Ибо ищете вы его снаружи, а обратить взор вам нужно во внутренность свою. Узрите скверну, окутавшую ваши души!"
"For you look outward in search for it, while it is inward that you must look. Then you will see the corruption enveloping your souls!"
languages.original_text: "Ибо ищете вы его снаружи, а обратить взор вам нужно во внутренность свою. Узрите скверну, окутавшую ваши души!"

traits.locale_text: "For you look outward in search for it, and it is inward that you must look. Then you will see the corruption enveloping your souls!"
"For you look outward in search for it, and it is inward that you must look. Then you will see the corruption enveloping your souls!"
"For you look outward in search for it, while it is inward that you must look. Then you will see the corruption enveloping your souls!"
"For you look outward in search for it, while it is inward that you must look. Then you will see the corruption enveloping your souls!"
"For you look outward in search for it, while it is inward that you must look. Then you will see the corruption enveloping your souls!"
"For you look outward in search for it, while it is inward that you must look. Then you will see the corruption enveloping your souls!"

languages.text: “你们想要寻求外界的救赎，但你们真正应该寻求的，是你们内心的救赎。只有这样，你们才能看到灵魂的腐化！”
languages.original_text: "For you look outward in search for it, while it is inward that you must look. Then you will see the corruption enveloping your souls!"

traits.locale_text: “你们想要寻求外界的救赎，但你们真正应该寻求的，是你们内心的救赎。只有这样，你们才能看到灵魂的腐化！”

languages.text: 「それを探し求めて外側を見ているが、実際に見るべきは内側だ。その時初めて、己の魂の腐敗に気が付くであろう！」
languages.original_text: "For you look outward in search for it, while it is inward that you must look. Then you will see the corruption enveloping your souls!"

traits.locale_text: 「それを探し求めて外側を見ているが、実際に見るべきは内側だ。その時初めて、己の魂の腐敗に気が付くであろう！」

languages.text: «Miran hacia fuera en su búsqueda, cuando es hacia dentro donde deben mirar. ¡Entonces verán la corrupción que envuelve sus almas!».
languages.original_text: "For you look outward in search for it, while it is inward that you must look. Then you will see the corruption enveloping your souls!"

traits.locale_text: «¿Por qué miran hacia fuera en su búsqueda siendo hacia dentro donde deben mirar? ¡Entonces verán la corrupción que envuelve sus almas!».

languages.text: "Denn Ihr blickt auf der Suche danach nach außen, dabei müsst Ihr nach innen blicken. Dann seht Ihr die Verderbnis, die Eure Seelen umklammert!"
languages.original_text: "For you look outward in search for it, while it is inward that you must look. Then you will see the corruption enveloping your souls!"

traits.locale_text: "Denn Ihr blickt auf der Suche danach nach außen, dabei müsst Ihr nach innen blicken. Dann seht Ihr die Verderbnis, die Eure Seelen umklammert!"

languages.text: « Pourquoi ? Parce que vous vous attendez à ce qu'il vienne à vous, alors que vous ne pourrez le trouver qu'en votre for intérieur. Alors seulement vous rendrez-vous compte de la corruption qui souille vos âmes ! »
languages.original_text: "For you look outward in search for it, while it is inward that you must look. Then you will see the corruption enveloping your souls!"

traits.locale_text: « Pourquoi ? Parce que vous vous attendez à ce qu'il vienne à vous, alors que vous ne pourrez le trouver qu'en votre for intérieur. Alors seulement vous rendrez-vous compte de la corruption qui souille vos âmes ! »

languages.text: "Sorunu dışarıda bulmaya çalışıyorsunuz, hâlbuki bakmanız gereken yer içiniz. Oraya baktığınız an, ruhlarınızı çevreleyen yozlaşmışlığı göreceksiniz!"
languages.original_text: "For you look outward in search for it, while it is inward that you must look. Then you will see the corruption enveloping your souls!"

traits.locale_text: "Sorunu dışarıda bulmaya çalışıyorsunuz, hâlbuki bakmanız gereken yer içiniz. Oraya baktığınız an, ruhlarınızı çevreleyen yozlaşmışlığı göreceksiniz!"
